Access You're from Druma.

You have entered the ranks of the Mercenary League and now wear the black uniform that's the source of the organization's popular epithet. You become trained in Intimidation; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Additional Lore] skill feat for Warfare Lore; if you were already trained in Warfare Lore, you also become trained in a Lore skill of your choice. While wearing medium or heavy armor, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks.
